title: WiFi Calling not working on Pixel 3 since Android 10 Security Update 5th June 2020
content:
I have noticed that since the Android 10 Security Update 5th June 2020 (which updated to my phone overnight), WiFi Calling no longer works. The signal icon now displays an X and the "EE WiFi Calling" text normally viewable when you swipe down from the top is no longer visible. I live in a dead signal area so this is pretty inconvenient.

I have tried:

Rebooting phone (several times)
Turning WiFi on and off
Turning Airplane Mode on and off
Turning Wifi Calling option on and off
Turning Mobile Data on and off

None of the above has solved it. Any ideas? Thanks.
